data.name: VBridger
data.detailed_description:
Want to use IPhone facial tracking to its fullest potential with your live2D model? Then look no further then VBridger!

VBridger is an intermediary application that allows the user to use data drivers for live data.

The basic version comes with settings to fully control a typical Live2d model in Vtube Studio as well as a set for a more detailed and complicated setup!

With the VBridger - Editor DLC, unlock the full potential of VBridger gaining the ability to create new drivers and mix and match any input parameters however you wish before sending them off to control your Live2d model!

Current available input sources:
•Tracking data from the IPhone ARKit FACS based face tracking system from the following apps
•ifacialmocap
•FaceMotion3D
•MeowFace (Android)

Current available output software:
•Vtube Studio via the Vtube Studio API allowing for the control of live2D models.

More on the way!
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: VBridger is a face tracking plugin designed for Vtube Studio and Live2D, which allows the user to make better use of IphoneX ARKit tracking on their live2D model.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Japanese, German, Russian, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU running at 2.5 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA graphics card with at least 2GB of dedicated VRAM and DirectX 11+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU running at 3.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA graphics card with at least 4GB of dedicated VRAM and DirectX 11+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:
